channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: An aspiring neurosurgeon and a campus Republican died in the Brown campus shooting
item.description: An aspiring neurosurgeon at Brown University and a leader of a campus Republicans group were in a study group preparing for an economics final, with the end of the semester in sight.

item.title: Search for the Brown University shooter resumes as questions swirl about campus security
What to know about the search for the Brown University shooting suspect
